sections.heading: Recommended Approach
sections.content: Following best practices will help you get the most out of the platform while avoiding common pitfalls. These guidelines are based on feedback from thousands of successful users.

sections.heading: Essential Guidelines
items: Start with clear goals and objectives
Use consistent naming conventions for projects
Regularly backup your important data
Keep your workspace organized and clutter-free
Take advantage of automation features
Stay updated with new features and improvements

sections.heading: Getting Help
sections.content: If you encounter any issues while using the platform, this section will help you resolve them quickly. Most problems have simple solutions that you can implement yourself.

sections.heading: Common Issues
items: Login problems - check your credentials and internet connection
Slow performance - clear your browser cache and cookies
Missing features - ensure you have the necessary permissions
Sync issues - refresh the page or log out and back in
File upload errors - check file size and format requirements

steps.title: Identify the Problem
steps.description: Clearly describe what's happening and when the issue occurs.

steps.title: Try Basic Solutions
steps.description: Refresh the page, clear cache, or try a different browser.

steps.title: Contact Support
steps.description: If basic solutions don't work, reach out to our support team with details.
